TopicTitle: Options to sort vessels by date

Articles.Content:
What really is missing is the option to sort the crafts when you want to load one in the VAB.

Sort by date would be soooo good to have, to see which vessel you worked on last time you played.

You may want to check out 

It doesn't give you a a "sort by date" option; it gives you something much more useful in my opinion:  Folders for your ships, so you can organize them.  It also gives you a history function that lets you access older versions of each vessel.
